content: is there a more detailed description of what nomads will be doing in game?
TBH im not in the CA so my expectations of whats possible in game might not be accurate
but im mostly interested in pvp, piracy and the like
do you have many people in CA at the moment?

Im still trying to wrap my head around the various factions/alliances in the game but I noticed you wear your adversarial status with substrate as a badge of honour... Will taunting the larger groups be par for the course?
